de.weltraumschaf.ebnf.gfx
Class StringPainter

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.ebnf.gfx.StringPainter

public class StringPainter
extends Object

Paints a centered string into a rectangular area. Also provides some helpers for measuring text and calculate positions. The algorithm for position the text as centered is from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5378052/positioning-string-in-graphic-java

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

drawCenteredString

public void drawCenteredString(String str,
                               Dimension size)
Draws a string centered inside the given size.

Parameters:
str - String to center.
size - Size of the rectangle to center inside.

drawCenteredString

public void drawCenteredString(String str,
                               Point offset,
                               Dimension size)
Draws a string centered inside the given size with an x and y offset..

Parameters:
str - String to center.
offset - X and y offset.
size - Size of the rectangle to center inside.
